column3: str
By reconditioning the anima, you can redistribute the attribute points allocated to your weapon.
You may only recondition the anima of the weapon equipped when speaking with Ulan.
The process can be canceled at any time.
What will you do?
Recondition the anima of a different weapon.
Recondition the anima of your equipped weapon.
In order to recondition the anima of a weapon, you must first equip it, then speak with Ulan.
In order to recondition the anima of a weapon, you must first equip it, then speak with Ulan.
You must equip your anima weapon before speaking with Ulan to proceed.
You must equip both the Sword and Shield of the Twin Thegns before speaking with Ulan to proceed.
Ardashir tells me you wish to alter the state of the anima, is that right?
Assuming we do not attempt to push beyond its current limitations, this should be a trivial matter.
Mind you, this process requires crystal sand. If you have none, I will gladly furnish you with more per our original arrangement.
But you need not worry about umbrite. For this we require elementally aspected sand to ever so slightly alter the anima's aetherial composition.
Unless you have any other questions, let us begin!
What will you do?
Recondition the anima.
Exchange items for crystal sand.
Ask about reconditioning.
Nothing.
You appear to be out of crystal sand, my friend. If you would have more, then I must ask you bring me supplies in exchange.
To carefully modify the anima's aetherial composition, we must make use of crystal sand once more. The process is quite different from our previous endeavor, but thankfully much simpler.
Nevertheless, it still requires a fair amount of crystal sand. If you require more, you must supply me with materials in exchange. A deal is a deal, after all.
Oh, and you need not bother with the umbrite. Stripping the sand of its elemental aspect would be counterproductive this time.
Conclude your business with Ulan?
That went rather well, would you not agree? If you should have need of my services again, you have but to ask.
The anima has been transformed, gaining newfound strength!
